Definition at line 32 of file GrMeshIB.h.

unsigned short * GrMeshIB::Map ( bool  writeOnly  ) 

locks the index buffer.

if we're a buffer with a local copy, then just return the local copy.

if we're not a buffer with a local copy, then we need to map the buffer and return the memory pointer.

return the start of buffer memory.

void GrMeshIB::Update ( unsigned int  start,
unsigned short *  source,
unsigned int  count 
)

updates a portion of the index buffer.

if we have a local copy, then simply update it. Otherwise, update the buffer directly.

create the index buffer if it doesn't already exist.

update the data.
